explains: n. （烹饪前塞在鸡、蔬菜等里的）填料，馅；（垫子、玩具等的）填充物；<非正式>（体育比赛中的）惨败
v. 填，塞；填满，装满；填作料，填馅 （stuff 的现在分词形式）

sentences.en: Chestnuts can be used at Christmastime, as a stuffing for turkey, guinea fowl, or chicken.
sentences.cn: 栗子可在圣诞节时用作火鸡、珍珠鸡或松鸡的填料。

sentences.en: She had already mixed the stuffing for the dumplings.
sentences.cn: 她已经把饺子馅和好了。

sentences.en: Prepare the stuffing first: mix the contents of the can with pressed onions.
sentences.cn: 首先准备馅料：把罐头的内容物和压过的洋葱混合.
